lead_paragraph: SLATER--Michael A.,81, founding partner of the CPA firm Slater, Kavitt & Schultz LLP, passed away on February 20, 2016 after a valiant battle with pancreatic cancer. Beloved husband, father, grandfather and friend. He will be sorely missed. Funeral Services Tuesday, February 23, 12 noon at Gutterman's, 175 N. Long Beach Rd., Rockville Centre, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SLATER, MICHAEL A.
